quest.name: The Pinnacle of Possibility
journal:
Emeny is eager to instruct you in the process of perfecting your tool.
※Changing classes or jobs will prevent progress during this quest.

Emeny eagerly divulges the steps you must follow in preparing your skysung tool for perfection. Aside from the introduction of Spanner into the works, it is much as you have done before─meaning that you will need to provide a substantial quantity of materials so that the necessary parts can be produced.

※Please note that you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

After much toil, you are finally able to present all of the delicate parts required to upgrade your tool to Emeny, who promptly rushes off to fetch her colleague. Neillemard's skills belie his nerves over carrying out the final augmentation, and at last you hold in your hands the culmination of all your efforts─a perfectly crafted skybuilders' tool, enhanced to the height of its power.
objectives: With Skysung SawSkysung Cross-pein HammerSkysung Raising HammerSkysung Lapidary HammerSkysung Round KnifeSkysung NeedleSkysung AlembicSkysung FrypanSkysung PickaxeSkysung HatchetSkysung Fishing Rod in your inventory or Armoury Chest, deliver 60 Oddly Delicate Saw Part60 Oddly Delicate Cross-pein Hammer Part60 Oddly Delicate Raising Hammer Part60 Oddly Delicate Lapidary Hammer Part60 Oddly Delicate Round Knife Part60 Oddly Delicate Needle Part60 Oddly Delicate Alembic Part60 Oddly Delicate Frypan Part250 Oddly Delicate Pickaxe Part and200 Oddly Delicate Fishing Rod Part and 25 Inconceivably Delicate Pickaxe Part 25 Inconceivably Delicate Hatchet Part 200 Oddly Delicate Fishing Reel Part to Emeny.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note that upon completing the quest “The Pinnacle of Possibility,” you will receive a skybuilders' tool for your current class of [Job].

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Undertake this quest as another class.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Undertake this quest as an [Job]a [Job].

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Be advised that once you have begun this quest, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted it.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please ensure that you have changed to your desired class before speaking with Emeny.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to advance the quest “The Pinnacle of Possibility,” you must have [Error] equipped or in your inventory.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have already received [Error]. Please change to a different class and speak with Emeny again.

dialogue.name: EMENY
dialogue.text: Are you ready to begin the preparations for upgrading your tool? Because I certainly am!

dialogue.name: EMENY
dialogue.text: You have another skysung tool to enhance, and you need my help to enhance it? Oh, how exciting! Why didn't you say so sooner!?

dialogue.name: EMENY
dialogue.text: We'll need delicate parts to create a true skybuilders' tool. Awfully delicate. Inconceivably delicate! Made of, oh, say...[Error]?

dialogue.name: EMENY
dialogue.text: We'll need delicate parts to create a true skybuilders' tool. Awfully delicate. Inconceivably delicate! Made of, oh, say...[Error] and [Error]?

dialogue.name: EMENY
dialogue.text: But not to worry! Spanner will handle all of the assembling and adjusting and tweaking. You need only provide the materials, just as you've done before.

dialogue.name: JOELLIE
dialogue.text: The only difference is that you'll have no cause to speak to Denys this time. In fact, you probably shouldn't─poor boy's under a lot of pressure these days.

dialogue.name: EMENY
dialogue.text: But don't worry─you can talk to me! Once the parts are assembled, show them to me and I'll make sure that each and every one meets Neillemard's exacting standards. Nothing escapes this engineer's eye!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: First, use your skysung tool to craft or harvest the necessary materials, and deliver them to Spanner at the workshop.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: After receiving the delicate parts from Spanner, present them along with your tool to Emeny to complete the upgrade process.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To craft materials, open the Crafting Log, followed by Special Recipes from within the requisite crafting discipline. Next, select Sidequests, then lastly Skysteel Tools to locate applicable recipes.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note that you must have your skysung tool equipped when crafting. Certain ingredients required to craft the items in question must be purchased via scrips or skybuilders' scrips.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Materials needed to upgrade a botanist's or miner's primary tool can be found in the Skysteel Tools section of the Gathering Log.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note that you must have your skysung tool equipped when gathering.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Upgrading a fisher's primary tool requires the use of specialized bait. This can be obtained from either Spanner or Denys.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, please note that you must have your skysung tool equipped when fishing.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: When making your final delivery to Emeny, the tool to be upgraded should be placed in your inventory or Armoury Chest, and not equipped.

dialogue.name: JOELLIE
dialogue.text: I doubt you need the reminder, but do make sure you use your skysung tool to procure the materials. This is the project's most critical phase, and I would rather not find out what happens if Neillemard doesn't get all of the measurements he desires.

dialogue.name: JOELLIE
dialogue.text: You may rely on me to keep Spanner in good working order in the meantime─no matter how long the process takes.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: First, use your skysung tool to craft or harvest the necessary materials, and deliver them to Spanner at the workshop.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: After receiving the delicate parts from Spanner, present them along with your tool to Emeny to complete the upgrade process.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To craft materials, open the Crafting Log, followed by Special Recipes from within the requisite crafting discipline. Next, select Sidequests, then lastly Skysteel Tools to locate applicable recipes.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note that you must have your skysung tool equipped when crafting. Certain ingredients required to craft the items in question must be purchased via scrips or skybuilders' scrips.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Materials needed to upgrade a botanist's or miner's primary tool can be found in the Skysteel Tools section of the Gathering Log.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note that you must have your skysung tool equipped when gathering.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Upgrading a fisher's primary tool requires the use of specialized bait. This can be obtained from either Spanner or Denys.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, please note that you must have your skysung tool equipped when fishing.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: When making your final delivery to Emeny, the tool to be upgraded should be placed in your inventory or Armoury Chest, and not equipped.

dialogue.name: EMENY
dialogue.text: By my count─yes, of course I was keeping count!─you have all of the parts you need. May I take a closer look?

dialogue.name: EMENY
dialogue.text: Just look at these... I can't wait another moment to see what your tool will look like once Neillemard puts them together. And I won't!

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: We came as quickly as we could.

dialogue.name: NIMIE
dialogue.text: For no particular reason, of course. The fact that this is vastly more interesting than filling Rowena's seemingly endless orders is quite unrelated.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: You were as eager as I, Nimie, do not pretend otherwise. As was Denys─but alas, those replica tools won't make themselves.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: Now, if all is in order... Shall we take your beloved tool to heights of which others have never even dared to dream?

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: The task before me is not to be underestimated, but mark my words, I will prevail! This I swear on my name as an engineer. ...Though perhaps I will bring Spanner. Merely as a precaution, of course!

dialogue.name: NIMIE
dialogue.text: He's a nervous wreck. Asked me about fifty times if I was certain I shouldn't be the one to handle this part. But how could I? It's his vision.

dialogue.name: NIMIE
dialogue.text: Besides, he's more than capable once he gets out of his own way. Just wait─he'll come through.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: I'm a genius!

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: I say to you now with full confidence that our grandest design has reached its true potential. This is a tool worthy of the Skysteel name─and of that noble soul who shall be the first to take it up. May you be the first of many skybuilders to benefit from its capabilities.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: If it's not too much to ask one more favor, might you be able to spare a moment to stop by the manufactory? Denys, too, deserves a chance to see the fruits of our labors.

dialogue.name: EMENY
dialogue.text: We should all go! After all, you can't set new technology loose into the world without a proper celebration. It just wouldn't be right!

dialogue.name: NIMIE
dialogue.text: I won't say no to basking in the glory of our accomplishment for a bit. Assuming you have the time, of course.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: Another smashing success! Perhaps someday I will be able to perform the necessary manipulations without sweating profusely─but not this day.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: In any case, it is time for you to take up your new skybuilders' tool. I can think of no better hands to wield it.
